item.description:
This is a SPECIAL event for COUPLES only!  

 

 

 

Ready for a magical Saturday night out together?

 

This is a workshop for couples who want to move beyond the existing boundaries of what seems possible in relationship and into greater intimacy, spiritual connection and joy.

 

Whether you've been married for many years, dating for a few months, or anywhere in between, you are invited to join other LOVE-MINDED couples.  It's unique for couples to meet other couples interested in the divinity of Tantra and the experience of sacred sexuality.  

You're invited to melt away the illusion of separation and embrace your relationship as a vehicle to awakening, healing and ecstatic fusion!

 

Here's your chance -- to meet each other -- and to have a sacred space created just for YOU to connect with your Beloved.  This clothing-on gathering will stoke the fire that's burning inside you and bring you closer to your own heart and that of your partner's.  

 

You'll leave: 

  • More deeply connected to your partner 
  • In love (what more is there to say?)
  • With practical tools to get you through the rough spots that inevitably come up 
  • Looking forward to the next one!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the Yoga Studio on the 2nd floor from 6-8 pm
item.name: Stoke The Fire Within: Tantra for Couples
